CVE-2007-2450.title: Apache Tomcat Manager and Host Manager cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2450.body: Apache Tomcat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Manager and Host Manager Web forms. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the filename parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Tomcat (6.0.HEAD, 5.5.HEAD, 5.0.HEAD, or 4.1.HEAD or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site. See References.For Red Hat Linux (tomcat):Refer to RHSA-2007:0569 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2458.title: Pixaria Gallery cfg[sys][base_path] parameter file include
CVE-2007-2458.body: Pixaria Gallery could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the class.Smarty.php script or various other scripts using the cfg[sys][base_path] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Pixaria Gallery (1.4.3 or later), available from the Pixaria Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2459.title: Imager Perl extension BMP file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2459.body: The Imager extension for Perl is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the read_4bit_bmp() and read_8bit_bmp() functions. By creating a malicious BMP image file and persuading a victim to open the file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Imager (0.57 or later), available from the Imager Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-2479.title: Trillian CTCP PING information disclosure
CVE-2007-2479.body: Trillian could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the IRC module. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending an overly long UTF-8 encoded CTCP PING message to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Trillian (3.1.5.0 or later), available from the Trillian Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2508.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect EarthAgent.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2508.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the RPCFN_EVENTBACK_Online() function in the EarthAgent.exe daemon. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to TCP port 3628, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (ServerProtect 5.58 for Windows Security Patch 3 - Build 1176), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2508.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect AgRpcCln.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2508.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the CAgRpcClient::CreateBinding() function in the AgRpcCln.dll library. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to TCP port 5168, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (ServerProtect 5.58 for Windows Security Patch 3 - Build 1176), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2509.title: PHP ftp_putcmd() function CRLF injection
CVE-2007-2509.body: PHP is vulnerable to CRLF injection, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ftp_putcmd() function. A remote attacker could inject arbitrary FTP commands using CRLF sequences, which will allow the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.2 or 4.4.7 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For Mandriva Linux:Refer to MDKSA-2007:102 and MDKSA-2007:103 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux:Refer to USN-462-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (php4):Refer to DSA-1296 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (php5):Refer to DSA-1295 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (PHP):Refer to GLSA 200705-19 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Avaya (PHP):Refer to ASA-2007-231 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2521.title: E-GADS! common.php file include
CVE-2007-2521.body: E-GADS! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the common.php script using the locale parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of E-GADS! (2.2.7 or later), available from the E-GADS! Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2522.title: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) products Console Server buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2522.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) Anti-Virus and Anti-Spyware products are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of the Console Server login credentials by the inoweb service. By attempting to log in using an overly long username or password, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Security Notice 050807 for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-2524.title: OTRS (Open Ticket Request System) index.pl cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2524.body: OTRS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.pl script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Subaction parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of OTRS available from the OTRS Web site. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (otrs2):Refer to DSA-1298 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2571.title: Xoops WF-Quote Module index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-2571.body: The Xoops WF-Quote Module is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the "c" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2572.title: NoAh mfa_theme.php file include
CVE-2007-2572.body: NoAh The PHP Content Architect could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the mfa_theme.php script using the tpls[1] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2575.title: Gallery Watermark module watermark.php file include
CVE-2007-2575.body: The Gallery Watermark module could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the watermark.php script using the GALLERY_BASEDIR parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2581.title: Microsoft SharePoint Server default.aspx PATH_INFO cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2581.body: Microsoft SharePoint Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the default.aspx script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the PATH_INFO string to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.— OR —Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2007-2582.title: IBM DB2 Universal Database DB2 JDBC Applet Server buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2582.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the DB2 JDBC Applet Server. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Apply the patch for your system, as listed in IBM APAR IY97750. See References.

CVE-2007-2583.title: MySQL IF clause denial of service
CVE-2007-2583.body: MySQL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a divide-by-zero error in IF clauses. By sending a specially-crafted IF clause, an authenticated remote attacker could cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of MySQL (5.0.40 or later), available from the MySQL Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2589.title: SquirrelMail compose.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-2589.body: SquirrelMail is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the compose.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted email within an IMG tag, which would allow the attacker to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activity, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious email message.Upgrade to the latest version of SquirrelMail (1.4.10 or later), available from Sourceforge.net. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (squirrelmail):Refer to DSA-1290-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. CVE-2007-2609.title: GNU EDU ETCDIR and LIBSDIR file include
CVE-2007-2609.body: GNU EDU could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the lom.php, lom_update.php, check-lom.php, or weigh_keywords.php scripts using the ETCDIR parameter or to the logout.php, help.php, index.php, or login.php scripts using the LIBSDIR parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2666.title: Scintilla RB buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2666.body: Scintilla is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the LexRuby.cxx module when processing RB ruby source files. By creating a specially-crafted .RB file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious file.Upgrade to the latest version of Scintilla (CVS 1.13 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Repository Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2666.title: Notepad++ RB file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2666.body: Notepad++ is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the SciLexer module when processing RB ruby source files. By creating a specially-crafted .RB file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious file.Upgrade to the latest version of Notepad++ (4.1.2 or later), available from the Notepad++ Web site. CVE-2007-2673.title: Censura vendorid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2007-2673.body: Censura is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the censura.php script using the vendorid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Censura (1.16.04 or later), available from the Censura Web site. CVE-2007-2719.title: HP Systems Insight Manager JSESSIONID session hijacking
CVE-2007-2719.body: HP Systems Insight Manager could allow a remote attacker to hijack an administrator's session, caused by the improper handling of session data. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a specially-crafted Web page containing a malicious JSESSIONID cookie value to hijack an administrator's session and gain complete administrative control, if the attacker could persuade the victim to visit a malicious Web page and login to the affected application.Refer to HPSBMA02213 SSRT061214 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. CVE-2007-2741.title: Little cms ICC profile buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2741.body: Little cms is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the embedded ICC profile image parser. By creating a specially-crafted JPEG image with an ICC profile, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash if the attacker could persuade the victim to view the malicious image.Update to the latest version of Little cms (1.15 or later), available from the Little cms Web site. CVE-2007-2745.title: Vdeck printcal.pl cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2745.body: Vdeck is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the printcal.pl script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the type parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2764.title: Sun Brocade SilkWorm embedded Linux kernel denial of service
CVE-2007-2764.body: Multiple Sun Brocade SilkWorm switches are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of user-created kernel processes by the embedded Linux kernel. CVE-2007-2780.title: PsychoStats server.php newtheme information disclosure
CVE-2007-2780.body: PsychoStats could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Apply the fix for this vulnerability (psychostats3.0.6b.zip), available from the PsychoStats Web site. CVE-2007-2788.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the image parsing code. CVE-2007-2789.body: Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) is vulnerable to a denial of service attack when the BMP image parser attempts to open local files on a Linux or Unix system while parsing BMP images. CVE-2007-2799.body: Christos Zoulas' file and applications implementing the program, such as AMaViS, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow when handling overly large files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a specially-crafted file to bypass the assert function and execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges, once the malicious file is opened.For Gentoo Linux:Refer to GLSA 200705-25 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. CVE-2007-2801.body: eTicket is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the open.php script. CVE-2007-2816.body: On-line bookmarks manager could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2007-2855.body: The Dart ZipLite Compression ActiveX control (DartZipLite.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. CVE-2007-2856.body: The PowerTCP ZIP Compression ActiveX control (DartZip.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. CVE-2007-2856.body: The PowerTCP Service ActiveX control (DartService.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. CVE-2007-2872.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an integer overflow error in the chunk_split() function. CVE-2007-1171.body: NukeSentinel is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-1211.title: Microsoft Windows GDI WMF image denial of service
CVE-2007-1211.body: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to a denial of service attack, caused by an invalid memory reference that can occur when an application attempts to interpret a malformed Windows Metafile (WMF) image. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site hosting a malformed WMF file, a remote attacker could cause the victim's system to stop responding and possibly restart.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS07-017. CVE-2007-2052.title: Python _localemodule.c information disclosure
CVE-2007-2052.body: Python could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an off-by-one error in the PyLocale_strxfrm function in Modules/_localemodule.c that could result in a memory leak. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified attack vector to read portions of memory.For Debian GNU/Linux:Apply the patch for this vulnerability, as listed in Debian Bug report logs - #416934. See References.For Mandriva Linux (python):Refer to MDKSA-2007:099 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. CVE-2007-2875.title: Linux kernel cpuset_tasks_read function information disclosure
CVE-2007-2875.body: Linux kernel could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an underflow error in the cpuset_tasks_read function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read kernel memory and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux kernel (2.6.20.13 or 2.6.21.4 or later), available from the Linux Kernel Web site. CVE-2007-2884.title: Microsoft Visual Basic Company Name buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2884.body: Microsoft Visual Basic is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of Visual Basic Project (VBF) files. By creating a specially-crafted VBP file and persuading the victim to open the project description page and select company name, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to consume all available CPU resources.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2884.title: Microsoft Visual Basic project detail buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2884.body: Microsoft Visual Basic is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By creating a specially-crafted VBP file containing an overly long project detail field, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2893.title: Bochs NE2000 buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2893.body: Bochs is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the emulated NE2000 device. By sending a large value in the TXCNT register, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.For Debian GNU/Linux (bochs):Refer to DSA-1351-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2898.title: 2z project rating.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-2898.body: 2z project is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-2899.title: Navboard config.php code execution
CVE-2007-2899.body: Navboard could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the config.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system with the privileges of the Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2914.title: PsychoStats multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2914.body: PsychoStats is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the awards.php, login.php, register.php, and weapons.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2931.title: Microsoft MSN Messenger video conversations buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2931.body: Microsoft MSN Messenger is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by the improper handling of video conversations. By persuading the victim to accept an incoming Web cam invitation and sending specially-crafted data, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS07-054. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2952.title: Blue Coat K9 Web Protection HTTP version buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2952.body: Blue Coat K9 Web Protection is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the filter service (k9filter.exe). By sending a specially-crafted HTTP response containing overly long version information, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the service to crash. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability, the attacker would need to perform DNS cache poisoning or use man-in-the-middle techniques to intercept a victim's request.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2954.title: Novell Client NWSPOOL.DLL buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2954.body: Novell Client is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the nwspool.dll library. See References.

CVE-2007-2957.title: McAfee E-Business Server authentication packet buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2957.body: McAfee E-Business Server is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the e-Business administration utility service. By sending a specially-crafted authentication packet with an overly large length value, a remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of McAfee E-Business Server (8.5.3 for Solaris or 8.1.2 for Linux/HP-UX/AIX or later), available from the McAfee Web site. CVE-2007-2967.title: Multiple F-Secure archive denial of service
CVE-2007-2967.body: Multiple F-Secure Anti-Virus applications are vulnerable to a denial of service. CVE-2007-2980.body: The LeadTools Raster ISIS Object (LTRIS14e.DLL) ActiveX control is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling the DriverName property. CVE-2007-2981.title: LeadTools Raster OCR Document Object ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2981.body: The LeadTools Raster OCR Document Object Library (ltrdc14e.dll) ActiveX control is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling the DictionaryFileName property. CVE-2007-3010.title: Alcatel-Lucent Unified Maintenance Tool OmniPCX masterCGI command execution
